mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PRODUCT ORDER BY PRONUM
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT (PRONUM,PRONAME, PROPRICE, PROCONTENT, PROIMG, PROTITLE, PROSTOCK, PROSELL, FLAG, PROCLASS) VALUES (PRODUCT_PRONUM.nextval, #{proName}, #{proPrice}, #{proContent}, #{proIng}, #{proTitle}, #{proStock}, #{proSell}, #{flag}, #{proClass})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PRODUCT WHERE BONUM = #{boNum} AND BOPW = #{boPw}
